_instructions: This is a Fruit Machine Builder configuration file (.fmb.json). You can edit this file externally and re-import it into the builder via the 'Load' button or drag-and-drop. All fields are documented below. For community sharing, include your name in the 'name' field.
name: My Custom Machine

symbols.name: Example Symbol
symbols._note: id must be unique, start with 'sym_'. image can be a base64 DataURL or empty. Set isWild:true for wild/substitute symbols.

reelStrips: _note: Each sub-array is one reel. Length must match 'stripLength'. Each entry is a symbol id from the 'symbols' array.

paylines._note: cells array length must match 'reels'. Each value is a row index (0-based). color is a CSS color string.

paytable._note: payouts keys are match counts (e.g. '3' = three-of-a-kind). Values are credit amounts.

events._note: type: 'synth' or 'file'. synthPreset options: 'mechanical', 'click', 'coin', 'fanfare', 'beep'. For 'file' type, set fileUrl to a base64 DataURL.

_developer_notes: This file can be edited in any text editor or programmatically generated.
Import back into the builder via the Load button or Open JSON.
